title: Apartment near Eiffel Tower - Segur Av.
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Near UNESCO - (1/2 block) and Eiffel Tower - European Space Agency
on Av. de Segur

2 bedrooms with 1 1/2 Bathrooms

Located on a beautiful tree lined street.
Well maintained and newly painted, new wooden floors.
Code entry from street
70 square meters
Kitchen fully equipped with many new appliances: washing machine, dish washer, microwave, electric oven, induction cook top with exhaust fan.
New refrigerator/freezer September 2021.
Flat screen 42” TV with Internet connection.
On 2rd floor with elevator - balcony. From the picture, it is the apartment above the balcony with lots of plants.
Central heat included
Ultra secure steel vault type entrance door (previous owner had valuable paintings)

Originally, the second bedroom had a wall and door. I had it removed so to open up the living room space but if you wish, I can have a new wall and door re-installed. This is something we can discuss.

See video on youtube:
https://youtu.be/XLUJT3_cYNQ

More details: 
www.owl-engineering.com/apartment

If interested, please email via Facebook with your name and phone number.
